subtitleNullable: Dataset containing Images of Wild Animals
descriptionNullable:
### Motivation:
This was built as I found some merit in the Problem statement of Classifying wild animals, as a lot of times we get confused.
Especially the animals coming from dog and cat families have a lot of similar features to other animals in the family and classifying them can be a good idea.

### Tasks
This dataset is built for Computer Vision Tasks in general and can be used to do Classifications Tasks, Detections Tasks to Generative Adversarial Networks to generate synthetic images of Animals.

### About the Data
Data is segregated into directories that go with the name of the Animal itself.

### What is there in the Data
Resized Images of Wildlife Animals, all resized to a size of 224,224. I also Plan to resize them all to 300,300 and other sizes for better usability.

### Source
Web scraping and using Javascript Manipulation to download images directly from Google Images
